options_useSameProxy.message: Use the same proxy server for all protocols

options_switchRulesEnable_help.message:
Switch Rules specify which proxy should be used for each URL.

When this option is enabled you'll see two more items in main menu:

Auto Switch Mode clicking this item will activate Switch Rules.
New Rule quickly add a new Switch Rule for the current website.

options_urlPattern_help.message:
Pattern of the page url.

Wildcard Reference
The asterisk (*) matches zero or more characters.
The question mark (?) matches exactly one character.

Examples
*://www.google.com/* Matches any URL that is on 'www.google.com' host and uses any scheme (http, https ...).
https://*.google.com/foo*bar Matches any URL that is on a 'google.com' host and uses the https scheme (such as 'www.google.com', 'docs.google.com', or 'google.com'), as long as the path starts with '/foo' and ends with 'bar'.
http://example.org/foo/bar.html Matches exactly the specified URL.

options_patternType_help.message:
The type of URL Pattern.

Wildcard for Wildcard matching.
RegExp for Regular Expression matching.

options_proxyProfile_help.message: The proxy profile to be applied when this rule is matched.

options_defaultRule_help.message:
This rule will be applied if no other rule is matched.

Note: This rule can't be deleted.

options_defaultRuleUrlPattern.message: All URLs that doesn't match any other pattern

options_ruleList_help.message: Import predefined Switch Rules from online repository.

options_ruleListUrl_help.message: The location of Rule List (you can't use local files).

options_reloadEvery_help.message: Auto reload the Rule List every...

options_ruleListProxyProfile_help.message: The proxy profile to be applied when any rule of this list is matched.

options_autoProxyCompatible_help.message: Check this option if the url points to an AutoProxy rule list (like 'gfwlist').

options_vpnDialupProxy_help.message: Also set proxy for this VPN/Dial-up connection.

options_monitorProxyChanges_help.message: Repeatedly check for changes in proxy settings done by other applications, and update Switchy icon to reflect those changes.

options_revertProxyChanges.message: Revert proxy changes done by other apps.

options_revertProxyChanges_help.message: Revert any change in proxy settings done by other applications.

options_exportPacFile_help.message: Export Switch Rules as a PAC file, so you can use it in other browsers.

options_exportRuleList_help.message: Export Switch Rules as a Switchy! Rule List file, so you can share it with friends.

options_makeBackup_help.message: Make a full backup of your Switchy! options (including proxies, rules and all other options).

options_quickSwitch_help.message:
Allows you to switch between two proxy profiles in one click (by clicking on Switchy icon).

Note: After enabling this feature you won't be able to see Switchy main menu when clicking on Switchy icon, and so to open this Options page again you should go to Chrome Extensions page (Chrome Menu > Extensions).

options_reapplyLastProfile.message: Auto apply last selected proxy profile on startup.

options_reapplyLastProfile_help.message: If this option is checked Switchy will apply last user-selected proxy profile on Chrome startup.

options_confirmDeletion_help.message: Show a confirmation dialog for deletion of proxy profiles or switch rules.

popup_autoSwitchMode_help.message:
Automatically choose the proper proxy profile 
for each URL, based on Switch Rules.

popup_newRule_help.message:
Quickly add a new Switch Rule 
for the current website.

popup_diagnoseError_help.message:
Switchy! isn't working properly. 
Click to open the error log.

popup_copyright.message: Copyright Â© 2009 Samabox. Some rights reserved.

popup_duplicateRules.message: * There is already a rule for this URL Pattern.

message_firstTimeWelcome.message:
Welcome first time user!
To start using Switchy set up some proxy profiles below and then press 'Save'.

message_rulesFirstTimeWelcome.message:
This is the first time you use Auto Switch Mode. Here is how to start:
  1. Set up the 'Default Rule' below, this rule will be applied if no other rule is matched.
  2. Add some rules (press 'New Rule' button), for each rule you should specify a URL Pattern and a Proxy Profile.
  3. Press 'Save' and 'Close' to close this tab.

message_deleteSelectedProfile.message:
Are you sure you want to delete selected profile?

Selected Profile: ($1)

message_deleteSelectedRule.message:
Are you sure you want to delete selected rule?

Selected Rule: ($1)

message_restoreOptionsBackup.message:
Are you sure you want to restore Switchy options from this backup?

Current Switchy! options will be overwritten.

message_selectBackupFile.message: You should set the backup file path first..

message_cannotReadOptionsBackup.message: Oops! Can't read the backup file!

message_cannotRestoreOptionsBackup.message:
Oops! Can't restore from this backup file!

The backup file is corrupted or invalid.

message_successRestoreOptionsBackup.message:
Switchy! options restored successfully..

You should restart Chrome for the new options to take effect.
